BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of sick time earned by employees.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Provision of sick time earned by employees.

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor (Michael R. Bloomberg) – Mayors veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 1208-A, A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of sick time earned by employees.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mayor's Veto - Int. No. 1208-A, Provision of sick time earned by employees.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of sick time earned by employees.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Provision of sick time earned by employees.

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor (Michael R. Bloomberg) – Mayors veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 1208-A, A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of sick time earned by employees.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Mayor's Message be Filed by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Mayor's Veto - Int. No. 1208-A, Provision of sick time earned by employees.
